bio: Doctor of Philosophy in Law•••Lawyer•••Founder Billions Team
impactDescription: I want to give lectures on financial literacy, including how to use blockchain technologies with optimism, and how not to lose money under such circumstances. I am an expert in this field and hold a Doctor of Philosophy in Law. I also have optimism and security in my plans to involve specialists for a more detailed explanation of technologies.
